title: Heated Saddle – Warmth on demand
description: Chilly morning? No problem. The saddle heats to a cozy 37°C in minutes — just tap the button underneath to switch it on. Low on battery use, high on comfort. It auto-switches off with the bike, so you can set it and forget it. (Note: not compatible with suspension seatpost or HS models.)
